events.event: Amazon Web Services (AWS) launched - cloud computing business begins
AWS publicly available - becomes infrastructure provider
Edward Snowden NSA revelations begin - Washington Post publishes leaks
Jeff Bezos purchases Washington Post for $250 million (personal purchase)
AWS awarded $600M CIA cloud contract for Intelligence Community (near WaPo purchase timing)
AWS expands intelligence community contracts - NSA, DoD, various agencies
Pentagon JEDI cloud contract competition - Amazon competes
Microsoft wins JEDI contract (Amazon protests, cites Trump political interference)
Pentagon cancels JEDI, announces new multi-cloud strategy (AWS and Microsoft)
Bezos steps down as Amazon CEO, remains executive chairman
